preference.name: IMM_PROPERTY_DESCRIPTOR_LOV
preference.preference_description: Defines a list of values composed by property name and dynamic lov name concatenated by a ; like follow. PropertyDescriptorName;DynamicLOVNameToBeDisplayed * The propertyDescriptorName could be the object_name or the real name of the property descriptor. * The dynamicLOVNameToBeDisplayed is the name of the custom dynamic lov, that contains the valid values for the property descriptor.
